thread.title: Mayweather may fight Pacquiao again, despite retirement claims
thread.title_full: Mayweather may fight Pacquiao again, despite retirement claims

title: Mayweather may fight Pacquiao again, despite retirement claims
text: Updated: 8:33 am LAS VEGAS (KSNV News3LV) -- Mayweather’s self-reported retirement doesn’t seem to have lasted long.Pacquiao himself threw the boxing world for a loop by saying he is in negotiations with Mayweather for a rematch, according to an AFP report. Mayweather previously insisted that his September 12 fight against Andre Berto would be his final appearance in the ring . Pacquiao announced that he wants to fight one more time before hanging up his gloves for good and pursuing a full-time career early next year as a politician in his native Philippines. The previous fight against Pacquiao caused some controversy after it came out that Pacquiao had acquired a shoulder injury before the fight, but did not disclose the injury until after the fight was over – leading to lawsuits claiming that the much-hyped fight was a fraud .
